1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Source code information.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.CodePt
7  ( -- * Code point
8    CodePt (..),
9    codePtColumnNo,
10    codePtDisplay,
11  
12    -- * Code pointer
13    CodePtr (..),
14
15    -- * Sourced
16    Sourced (..),
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude       as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.IOPoint    as B
22
23
24-- ----------------------  CodePt
25
26-- | Point of input code.
27data CodePt = CodePt
28      { codePtSource     :: B.NIOPoint  -- ^ Source of code
29      , codePtLineNo     :: Int         -- ^ Line number
30      , codePtLineText   :: String      -- ^ Line content
31      , codePtText       :: String      -- ^ Text at which begins token
32      } deriving (Eq)
33
34-- | Number of input point, line number, and column number,
35--   e.g., @\<I1-L6-C14\>@.
36instance Show CodePt where
37    show cp = "<I" ++ show (B.nioNumber $ codePtSource cp)
38              ++ "-L" ++ show (codePtLineNo cp)
39              ++ "-C" ++ show (codePtColumnNo cp)
40              ++ ">"
41
42instance Ord CodePt where
43    compare = codePtCompare
44
45-- | Empty code point, i.e., empty content and zero line number.
46instance B.Default CodePt where
47    def = CodePt B.def 0 "" ""
48
49codePtCompare :: CodePt -> CodePt -> Ordering
50codePtCompare p1 p2 = line B.<> column where
51    line   = codePtLineNo p1 `compare` codePtLineNo p2
52    column = size p2 `compare` size p1
53    size   = length . codePtText
54
55-- | Column number at which code starts.
56codePtColumnNo :: CodePt -> Int
57codePtColumnNo CodePt { codePtLineText = line, codePtText = subline }
58    = length line - length subline
59
60-- | Create position and line information.
61codePtDisplay :: (String, CodePt) -> [(String, String)]
62codePtDisplay (tag, p)
63    | lno > 0   = [ (pos, ""), ("> " ++ shorten text, tag) ]
64    | otherwise = []
65    where
66      pos       = show lno ++ " " ++ show cno ++ " " ++ code
67      lno       = codePtLineNo p
68      cno       = codePtColumnNo p
69      code      = B.ioPointText $ B.nioPoint $ codePtSource p
70      text      = codePtText p
71
72      shorten :: O.StringMap
73      shorten s | length s > 48  = take 45 s ++ "..."
74                | otherwise      = s
75
76
77-- ----------------------  CodePtr
78
79-- | Type which has code points.
80class CodePtr a where
81    codePtList :: a -> [CodePt]
82
83    codePt :: a -> CodePt
84    codePt p = B.headNull B.def $ codePtList p
85
86instance CodePtr CodePt where
87    codePtList cp  = [cp]
88    codePt     cp  =  cp
89
90
91-- ----------------------  Sourced
92
93-- | Type with source code information.
94data Sourced a =
95    Sourced { source    :: [CodePt]
96            , unsourced :: a
97            } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
98
99instance Functor Sourced where
100    fmap f (Sourced src x) = Sourced src $ f x
101
102instance CodePtr (Sourced a) where
103    codePtList = source
104
